dict.string: This app requires access to your calendar to access your calendar events.
This app requires access to your reminders to manage your tasks and reminders.
This app uses your contacts to search for and create new contact entries.
This app uses your location to provide location-based assistance.
This app uses your media library to control music playback.
This app analyzes and organizes your photos.
This app uses the microphone for voice input and commands.
